channel.title: Simple compiler error?

item.title: Simple compiler error?
item.dc:creator: @LogicalTwink LogicalTwink
item.description:
@LogicalTwink wrote:

@echo off
title Client Compiler
echo starting…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_9/bin/javac.exe” -cp lib/; -d bin -sourcepath src src/.java
@pause

Okay thats my compiling method in my compiler. Do you see anything wrong the error i’m getting is this;

starting…
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

I know this error means I specified the wrong path, but i’ve looked over it multiple times, and I don’t see anything wrong!

Read full topic
